title: Business Process Flow Deck
description: A comprehensive collection of 10 modern infographics and flow diagrams. Features a clean, professional aesthetic with a consistent color palette of deep greens, reds, and oranges. Ideal for mapping complex business processes, project roadmaps, and organizational hierarchies.

slides.title: STRATEGIC CORE WHEEL
slides.description: A circular process diagram with 5 options surrounding a central mission hub. Uses bold arrow shapes and distinct colors for each phase.
slides.content: A: Innovation. B: Development. C: Operations. D: Marketing. E: Support.

slides.title: VERTICAL DELIVERY PIPELINE
slides.description: A unique vertical infographic where 5 distinct process streams rise from a base foundation, each capped with a representative icon.
slides.content: Phase A: Research. Phase B: Design. Phase C: Prototyping. Phase D: Testing. Phase E: Global Deployment.

slides.title: CYCLIC FEEDBACK LOOP
slides.description: A two-step circular system highlighting continuous improvement and bi-directional data flow with central team interaction.
slides.content: Step 01: Data Collection and Analysis. Step 02: Strategic Implementation and Review.

slides.title: HIERARCHICAL SYSTEMS TREE
slides.description: A detailed tree-style flowchart showing hierarchical relationships and branching logic for multi-stage projects.
slides.content: Root: Executive Strategy. Branches: Technical Infrastructure, Creative Assets, Market Research, Financial Planning.

slides.title: PHASED ACTION GRID
slides.description: A structured grid layout for presenting four distinct project phases or service categories with detailed bullet points and icons.
slides.content: Title One: Analysis and Insights. Title Two: Creative Execution. Title Three: Technical Build. Title Four: Quality Assurance.

slides.title: CONCENTRIC LAYERED MODEL
slides.description: Concentric circle diagram illustrating core-to-periphery relationships or expanding service capabilities.
slides.content: Core: Vision and Values. Layer 1: Operational Excellence. Layer 2: Customer Satisfaction. Layer 3: Market Leadership.

slides.title: ZIGZAG MILESTONE PATH
slides.description: A dynamic zigzag diagram with rounded diamond shapes, perfect for representing a 4-5 stage project roadmap or evolution.
slides.content: Phase 1: Opportunity Identification. Phase 2: Resource Allocation. Phase 3: Project Execution. Phase 4: Delivery and Optimization.

slides.title: DISTRIBUTED HUB SYSTEMS
slides.description: A central hub connected to 4-5 secondary nodes, illustrating a centralized management structure or integrated service network.
slides.content: Hub: Management. Nodes: Finance, Technology, Human Resources, Creative Services, Sales Strategy.

slides.title: SEQUENTIAL TAB FLOW
slides.description: Alternating rounded tab infographic that presents a linear step-by-step process with clear visual breaks and icon support.
slides.content: Step A: Planning. Step B: Communication. Step C: Recruitment. Step D: Onboarding.

slides.title: COMPREHENSIVE AUDIT MATRIX
slides.description: A high-density grid for auditing complex processes, showing stages and sub-tasks in a structured, easy-to-read table format.
slides.content: Phase 1: Initial Discovery. Phase 2: Strategic Gap Analysis. Phase 3: Implementation Roadmap. Phase 4: Final Assessment.
